## Lecture Slide Links

The following slides have links to the lecture slides for the S62 semester offering of
MATH 1052H at Trent University. 

<br />

* the HTML slides are the canonical format
* the PDFs aren't bad
* the Powerpoints are kinda hideous, only use them if you really love Powerpoint
for some reason
